metadata.description: How much you can count on them to deliver and follow through

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Saturn shows discipline and follow-through. Mars shows energy to complete tasks. Sun shows integrity and commitment.

planet_meanings.Mars: energy and drive to get things done
planet_meanings.Sun: integrity and commitment to their word

very_low.label: Unsteady
very_low.guidance: Likely can't rely on them; suggest backups.

low.label: Spotty
low.guidance: Sometimes solid, sometimes not; clear deadlines help.

high.label: Trustworthy
high.guidance: Can mostly count on them; good for important tasks.

very_high.label: Rock-Solid
very_high.guidance: Very dependable; safe for critical pieces.
